scripts.example1: phixify all --verbose --project-dir project1 --config-file ./config/.phixify.multi_project_multi_bundle.json && phixify all --verbose --project-dir project2 --config-file ./config/.phixify.multi_project_multi_bundle.json
scripts.example2: phixify all --verbose --project-dir project1 --config-file ./config/.phixify.multi_project_single_bundle.json && phixify all --verbose --project-dir project2 --config-file ./config/.phixify.multi_project_single_bundle.json
